member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.Helpers.CspConfigMapper
member.summary: Infrastructure. Not intended to be called by your code directly.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.Helpers.ICspConfigMapper
member.summary: Infrastructure. Not intended to be called by your code directly.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the Content-Security-Policy header (assuming there are directives enabled).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspAttributeBase
member.summary: This is an abstract class which cannot be used directly.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspAttributeBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the header is set in the HTTP response. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspAttributeBase.XContentSecurityPolicyHeader
member.summary: The X-Content-Security-Policy header is no longer supported as modern browsers now support the standardized CSP header.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspAttributeBase.XWebKitCspHeader
member.summary: The X-WebKit-Csp header is no longer supported as modern browsers now support the standardized CSP header.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFormActionAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the form-action directive for the CSP header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase
member.summary: This is a base class which should not be used directly.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the CSP directive is enabled in the CSP header. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase.None
member.summary: Sets whether the 'none' source is included in the directive. Not setting it will inherit existing configuration.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase.Self
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the 'self' source is included in the directive. Not setting it will inherit existing configuration (default behaviour).

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase.InheritCustomSources
member.summary: Gets or sets whether CustomSources should be inherited from previous settings. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspDirectiveAttributeBase.CustomSources
member.summary: Gets or sets other sources for the directive. Sources are separated by exactly one whitespace. Source examples are scheme only ("https:"), any host ("*"), a host ("*.nwebsec.com", "www.nwebsec.com", "https://www.nwebsec.com", "www.nwebsec.com:443", "https://www.nwebsec.com:*"). See the Content Security Policy 1.0 standard for details.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspChildSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the child-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspBaseUriAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the base-uri directive for the CSP header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFormActionReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the form-action directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspChildSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the child-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspBaseUriReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the base-uri directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFrameAncestorsReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the frame-ancestors directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 2).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFrameAncestorsAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the frame-ancestors directive for the CSP header (CSP 2).

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspHtmlHelpers.CspScriptNonce(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Generates a CSP nonce HTML attribute. The 120-bit random nonce will be included in the CSP script-src directive.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspHtmlHelpers.CspStyleNonce(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Generates a CSP nonce HTML attribute. The 120-bit random nonce will be included in the CSP style-src directive.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspSandboxReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the sandbox directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase
member.summary: This class is abstract and cannot be used directly.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.Enabled
member.summary: Sets whether the sandbox directive is enabled in the CSP header. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowForms
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-forms flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowPointerLock
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-pointer-lock flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowPopups
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-popups flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowSameOrigin
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-same-origin flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowScripts
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-scripts flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspSandboxAttributeBase.AllowTopNavigation
member.summary: Sets whether the allow-top-navigation flag is included in the sandbox directive. The default is false.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspSandboxAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the sandbox directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspConnectSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the connect-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspConnectSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the connect-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspDefaultSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the default-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspDefaultSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the default-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFontSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the font-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFontSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the font-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFrameSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the frame-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0). This directive has been deprecated in CSP 2, consider using child-src instead.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspFrameSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the frame-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0). This directive has been deprecated in CSP 2, consider using child-src instead.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspImgSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the img-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspImgSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the img-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspMediaSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the media-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspMediaSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the media-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspObjectSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the object-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspObjectSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the object-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only header (assuming there are directives enabled).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspReportUriAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the report-uri directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0). Support for absolute URIs was added in CSP 2.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspReportUriAttributeBase
member.summary: This class is abstract and cannot be used directly.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspReportUriAttributeBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the report-uri directive is enabled in the CSP header. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspReportUriAttributeBase.EnableBuiltinHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the URI for the built in CSP report handler should be included in the directive. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.Internals.CspReportUriAttributeBase.ReportUris
member.summary: Gets or sets custom report URIs for the directive. Report URIs are separated by exactly one whitespace.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspReportUriReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the report-uri directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0). Support for absolute URIs was added in CSP 2.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspScriptSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the script-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspScriptSrcAttribute.UnsafeInline
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the 'unsafe-inline' source is included in the directive. Not setting it will inherit existing configuration.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspScriptSrcAttribute.UnsafeEval
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the 'unsafe-eval' source is included in the directive. Not setting it will inherit existing configuration.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspScriptSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the script-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspStyleSrcAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the style-src directive for the CSP header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspStyleSrcAttribute.UnsafeInline
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the 'unsafe-inline' source is included in the directive. Not setting it will inherit existing configuration.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.Csp.CspStyleSrcReportOnlyAttribute
member.summary: When applied to a controller or action method, enables the style-src directive for the CSP Report Only header (CSP 1.0).

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.SetNoCacheHttpHeadersAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether appropriate headers to prevent browser caching should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.SetNoCacheHttpHeadersAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.SetNoCacheHttpHeadersAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Gets of sets whether cache headers should be included in the response to prevent browser caching. The default is true.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XContentTypeOptionsAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether the X-Content-Type-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XContentTypeOptionsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XContentTypeOptionsAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the X-Content-Type-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response. The default is true.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XDownloadOptionsAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether the X-Download-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XDownloadOptionsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XDownloadOptionsAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the X-Download-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response. The default is true.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether the X-Frame-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsAttribute.Policy
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the X-Frame-Options security header should be set in the HTTP response. Possible values are: Disabled, Deny, SameOrigin. The default is Deny.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsPolicy.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should not be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsPolicy.Deny
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should be set in the HTTP response, instructing the browser to not display the page when it is loaded in an iframe.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XFrameOptionsPolicy.SameOrigin
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Frame-Options header should be set in the HTTP response, instructing the browser to display the page when it is loaded in an iframe - but only if the iframe is from the same origin as the page.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether the X-Robots-Tag header should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the X-Robots-Tag header should be set in the HTTP response. The default is true.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoIndex
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not index the page. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoFollow
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not follow links on the page. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoSnippet
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not display a snippet for the page in search results. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoArchive
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not offer a cached version of the page in search results. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoOdp
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not use information from the Open Directory Project for the page's title or snippet. The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoTranslate
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not offer translation of the page in search results (Google only). The default is false.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XRobotsTagAttribute.NoImageIndex
member.summary: Gets of sets whether search engines are instructed to not index images on the page (Google only). The default is false.

member.name: T:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionAttribute
member.summary: Specifies whether the X-Xss-Protection security header should be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: M:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionAttribute.Policy
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the X-Xss-Protection security header should be set in the HTTP response. Possible values are: Disabled, FilterDisabled, FilterEnabled. The default is FilterEnabled.

member.name: P:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionAttribute.BlockMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable the IE XSS filter block mode. This setting only takes effect when the Policy is set to FilterEnabled. The default is true.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionPolicy.Disabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should not be set in the HTTP response.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionPolicy.FilterDisabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly disabling the IE XSS filter.

member.name: F:NWebsec.Mvc.HttpHeaders.XXssProtectionPolicy.FilterEnabled
member.summary: Specifies that the X-Xss-Protection header should be set in the HTTP response, explicitly enabling the IE XSS filter.
